Sulphur potion

The sulphur potion is an item obtained during A Kingdom Divided, in which players make it by adding volcanic sulphur to a defence potion with three or more doses. It is enchanted into a shielding potion by the Tasakaal.

If players attempt to drink it, they will exclaim "I really don't think I should drink this."

[[File:Sulphur potion detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''sulphur potion''' is an item obtained during [[A Kingdom Divided]], in which players make it by adding [[volcanic sulphur]] to a [[defence potion]] with three or more doses. It is enchanted into a [[shielding potion]] by the [[Tasakaal]].

If players attempt to drink it, they will exclaim "''I really don't think I should drink this.''"
